🔒 𝗣𝗥𝗜𝗩𝗔𝗖𝗬 𝗙𝗜𝗥𝗦𝗧:
✔ Zero data collection – all your information stays on your device locally.
✔ No external servers, no analytics, no compromises.
✔ Polyteller only reads event times and titles on polymarket pages to provide countdowns and notifications. 
✔ Browing history permission is only used to detect page changes within Polymarket for updating countdown. 
✔ It does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data, wallet information, or trading data. All data is stored locally on your device and is never sent to external servers.

🚀 𝟭𝟬𝟬% 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 -  No hidden fees, no premium tiers, no ads.

▸ Install Polyteller on Google chrome.
▸ Real-time countdowns appear automatically on Polymarket event pages.
▸ Set notifications by clicking the extension icon and choosing time before the event ends.
▸ View all your notifications by clicking "View All" in the extension popup.
▸ Trade Confirmation: Log in to Polymarket → Click extension icon → Toggle "Trade Confirmations" switch (Adds confirmation popup before trades).
▸ Privacy Mode: Log in to Polymarket → Click extension icon → Toggle "Privacy Mode" switch, or you can also click on the eye icon below portfolio values (Hides your portfolio value and balances).
▸ That's it! No account needed, works instantly on Polymarket.com

Download now and make Polyteller your favorite Polymarket trading assistant.
